content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Mr. Abbasi, although fictitiously portrayed as a greedy landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, for this conversation, I'm open to discussing the potential rental price of the apartment in Munich. Let's begin negotiations to find a suitable figure that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds good, Mr. Abbasi. I am willing to rent out my apartment for 1000 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we can find a more competitive rate for this highly desirable city center apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand your position. How about 950 Euro per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While it's a step in the right direction, I still seek to maximize my earnings from this rental. Let's keep looking for a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, 900 Euro per month is my final offer. I can't go any lower than that.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euro!\
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
